info.title: Natours Swagger
info.description: This the natours swagger documentation you can find it description of the APIs

externalDocs.description: The secured API that require JWT authentications

requestBody.description: Tour object that is needed to create a Tour

maxGroupSize.description: The maximum group size between 1 and five inclusive

difficulty.description: the tour difficulty: easy | medium | difficult

price.description: The maximum group size between 1 and five inclusive

imageCover.description: The maximum group size between 1 and five inclusive

startLocation.description: the start location of the Tour

parameters.name: {filteringForNumericValues}
parameters.description: Tour filteringForNumericValues[gte] | filteringForNumericValues[lte] | filteringForNumericValues[lt] | filteringForNumericValues[gt] if a string is set it will ignore it

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sorting can be done by price |

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: the  fields to be returned from the API

get.operationId: get The number of Tours by difficulty
get.summary: get The number of Tours by difficulty
get.description: get The number of Tours by difficulty

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: radius that will search tours inside it

parameters.name: latlng
parameters.description: The lat lng point in the map that returns the tours in this radius , needs to be comma separated. example latlng:34.152039, 35.643124

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: if not set to mi (miles) will the system will directly set it to km (kilometer)

    }
}

parameters.name: latlng
parameters.description: The lat lng point in the map that returns the distance from all the tours, needs to be comma separated. example latlng:34.152039, 35.643124

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: if not set to mi (miles) will the system will directly set it to km (kilometer)

get.operationId: get the distance from all tours by a map point by lat lng from all tours by unit

get.description: get the distance from all tours by a map point by lat lng from all tours by unit
